subject: Payment failure on checkout for order #1824
body:
Hi Support,

Our client cannot process a payment on the checkout page. It fails with a 3DS timeout and shows an error. We need a workaround today.

Thanks

subject: Feature request: export dashboard to PDF
body:
Hello team,
It would be great to have a PDF export option for analytics dashboards. No rush, adding this to the backlog is okay.
Thanks!

subject: Login issue after password reset
body: User reports that after resetting the password they are still unable to login. Could we investigate by EOD tomorrow?
